item.title: Linux OS Management
item.description: Introduction In this post we will go over foundations of the Linux operating system and its management. Different tasks will be perform on the Ubuntu Server 20.04.2 We are an intern at the Department of Parks and Recreation of Pawnee, Indiana. Our task will be to set up a running Ubuntu Server with different users and their permissions, groups of employees based on the tasks they perform etc. We have full access to this server.
item.dc:creator: Martin Kubecka
